snippet.title: 5 kinds of Agile bandits: Say/Do Metrics
snippet.description:
*Unmasking Agile Banditry: The Truth Behind Say-Do Metrics* - Discover the hidden truths of agile practices and the pitfalls of say-do metrics. Dive into real-world examples and learn how to focus on genuine outcomes over misleading outputs.

*Enjoy this video? üîî Like and subscribe to our channel:* https://www.youtube.com/@nakedAgility

In this video, Martin üåü exposes the deceptive practices often seen in agile environments, particularly focusing on say-do metrics. He shares an eye-opening case from his experience, highlighting how these metrics can lead to falsified project data and undermine the true spirit of agility. üìäüö´ Through vivid examples, Martin illustrates the importance of authenticity and transparency in agile processes and how misleading metrics can detrimentally affect project outcomes and team morale. üöÄüõ†Ô∏è

*Key Takeaways:*
00:00:00 Agile Practices and Say-Do Metrics
00:00:27 Misleading Metrics in Project Management
00:01:17 Vanity Metrics and Lack of Transparency
00:02:14 Focusing on Outcomes Over Outputs
00:03:16 Avoiding Agile Banditry

*NKDAgility can help!*
